opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Face, Virginia Commissioner of Financial Institutions v. National Home Equity Mortgage Assn

opinion:
537 U.S. 802

FACE, VIRGINIA COMMISSIONER OF FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS, ET AL.
v.
NATIONAL HOME EQUITY MORTGAGE ASSN.

No. 01-1827.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 7, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FOURTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 4th Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Gonzaga Univ. v. Doe, 536 U. S. 273 (2002). Reported below: 283 F. 3d 220.
